channel.title: Welcome to JTaccuino - JTaccuino
channel.description: Welcome to JTaccuino JTaccuino is a JavaFX based notebook application for Java developers. It is built for usages in education, interactive experimentation with algorithms, and more advanced use cases. Java code execution is provided by JShell, the awesome Java REPL.

item.title: Download and Sources
item.description: Download the Application Builds for Windows, Linux, and macOS are available on the releases page of the GitHub project. Examples You can find many examples in the GitHub repository. Download the Sources In case you want to learn how the application works, file a bug, propose an improvement, please check the GitHub repository

item.title: Videos
item.description: Learn more about JTaccuino The project got presented at various conferences. Devoxx 2024, Belgium JChampions Conference 2025, Online
